div1.p: IN THE DISTRICT COURT OF THE UNITED STATES FOR THE WESTERN DISTRICT OF WASHINGTON
In the Matter of the Unlawful Detention of PALA SINGH, HINDOO ALIEN.
IN THE DISTRICT COURT OF THE UNITED STATES FOR THE WESTERN DISTRICT OF WASHINGTON, NORTHERN DIVISION.
In the Matter of the Unlawful Detention of the PALA SINGH, Hindoo Alien. : : :
TO HON. ELLIS DeBRULER, COMMISSIONER OF IMMIGRATION, AND TO THOSE WHO MAY HAVE IN CHARGE PALA SINGH, HINDOO ALIEN, GREETINGS:

You, and each one of you, are hereby advised that on this 30th day of October, 1913, a petition for a writ of habeas corpus and show cause order was duly filed, said petition alleging certain irregularities and failures to comply with law in the matter of the deportation of Pala Singh, and the court being satisfied that this is a case in which a show cause order should be issued,

YOU, AND EACH OF YOU, ARE HEREBY COMMANDED to appear on the 14th day of Nov, 1913, at 10 A.M. in the United States District Court for the Western District of Washington, Northern Division, at Seattle, and then and there to show cause why a writ of habeas corpus should not be granted and why you should not be enjoined and restrained from deporting Pala Singh, Hindoo alien; and be it further provided

That you, and each of you, are commanded to keep the said Pala Singh, petitioner, in your charge in the City of Seattle, State of Washigton, and not to deport or to make any effort to deport said Pala Singh, Alien, until the matter has
been ruled upon by this court.
Done in open court this 30 day of October, 1913.
